mapper.select: select CU.id as CU_ID,CU.NAME,CU.PARENT_NAME,dt.QUANTITY_ONDUTY,od.ORDER_QUANTITY from np_sys_controlunit cu LEFT JOIN (select c.ID, AVG(d.QUANTITY_ONDUTY) AS QUANTITY_ONDUTY from jd_le_labour_onduty d inner join np_sys_controlunit c on c.id=d.CU_ID where concat( DATE_FORMAT(d.BIZ_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-', DATE_FORMAT(d.TIMING, '%H') ) >= #{starttime} AND concat( DATE_FORMAT(d.BIZ_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-', DATE_FORMAT(d.TIMING, '%H') ) < #{endtime} group by c.id) dt on dt.id=CU.id LEFT JOIN (select c.id,sum(q.ORDER_QUANTITY) AS ORDER_QUANTITY from jd_le_order_quantity q inner join np_sys_controlunit c on c.id=q.CU_ID where concat( DATE_FORMAT(q.BIZ_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-', q.TIME_PERIOD ) >= #{starttime} AND concat( DATE_FORMAT(q.BIZ_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-', q.TIME_PERIOD ) < #{endtime} group by c.id)od on od.id=cu.id where cu.PARENT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{area}, '%') AND cu. NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pimsname}, '%') LIMIT #{startpages},#{pageSize}

select AVG(e.period_efficiency) as AVG_EFFICIENCY from jd_le_labour_efficiency e where cu_id =#{cuid} and CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(e.BIZ_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d'),'-',e.TIME_PERIOD)>= #{starttime} and CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(e.BIZ_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d'),'-',e.TIME_PERIOD) < #{endtime}

select PERSON_TYPE,QUANTITY_ONDUTY from jd_le_labour_onduty where cu_id=#{cuid} and concat(DATE_FORMAT(BIZ_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d'),'-',DATE_FORMAT(TIMING,'%H')) >= #{starttime} and concat(DATE_FORMAT(BIZ_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d'),'-',DATE_FORMAT(TIMING,'%H')) < #{endtime} group by PERSON_TYPE

select count(DISTINCT o.cu_id) from JD_LE_LABOUR_ONDUTY o left join NP_SYS_CONTROLUNIT c on c.id=o.CU_ID where c.PARENT_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{area},'%') and concat(DATE_FORMAT(o.BIZ_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d'),'-',DATE_FORMAT(o.TIMING,'%H')) >= #{starttime} and concat(DATE_FORMAT(o.BIZ_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d'),'-',DATE_FORMAT(o.TIMING,'%H')) < #{endtime} and c.NAME like CONCAT('%',#{pimsname},'%')

select CU.id as CU_ID,CU.NAME,CU.PARENT_NAME,dt.QUANTITY_ONDUTY,od.ORDER_QUANTITY from np_sys_controlunit cu LEFT JOIN (select c.ID, AVG(d.QUANTITY_ONDUTY) AS QUANTITY_ONDUTY from jd_le_labour_onduty d inner join np_sys_controlunit c on c.id=d.CU_ID where concat( DATE_FORMAT(d.BIZ_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-', DATE_FORMAT(d.TIMING, '%H') ) >= #{starttime} AND concat( DATE_FORMAT(d.BIZ_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-', DATE_FORMAT(d.TIMING, '%H') ) < #{endtime} group by c.id) dt on dt.id=CU.id LEFT JOIN (select c.id,sum(q.ORDER_QUANTITY) AS ORDER_QUANTITY from jd_le_order_quantity q inner join np_sys_controlunit c on c.id=q.CU_ID group by c.id)od on od.id=cu.id where cu.PARENT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{area}, '%') AND cu. NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pimsname}, '%')

select dd.controlunitid as CONTROLUNITID, sum(case when dd.WORK_TYPE='1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as NORMAL, sum(case when dd.WORK_TYPE='2' THEN 1 when dd.WORK_TYPE='3' THEN 1 when dd.WORK_TYPE='4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as NOTNORMAL, sum(case when dd.WORK_TYPE='5' THEN 1 END) as OTHER from ( select DISTINCT card.controlunitid,date_format(door.OPEN_TIME,'%y-%m-%d') open_time,wtp.work_type,door.card_id from np_dt_door_inout door LEFT JOIN np_cd_card card on door.CARD_ID = card.ID LEFT JOIN np_sys_person person on person.ID = card.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN (select person_code,work_type from np_sys_person p LEFT JOIN np_cd_card c on p.id=c.PERSON_ID and c.PERSON_ID is null) wtp on person.PERSON_CODE=wtp.person_code where DATE_FORMAT(door.OPEN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d-%H') >= #{starttime} AND DATE_FORMAT(door.OPEN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d-%H')<#{endtime} and door.CARD_ID is not null group by card.controlunitid,open_time,wtp.work_type,door.card_id ) dd group by dd.controlunitid
